body: The product details issue should be fixed. The latest version of product details has a bug that was causing the issues with `PDDatabaseStorage` so I rolled back the version. I tried to fix the subsequent issues with mock-recipe-server but I think someone else should probably look at that.
body_text: The product details issue should be fixed. The latest version of product details has a bug that was causing the issues with PDDatabaseStorage so I rolled back the version. I tried to fix the subsequent issues with mock-recipe-server but I think someone else should probably look at that.
body_html: The product details issue should be fixed. The latest version of product details has a bug that was causing the issues with PDDatabaseStorage so I rolled back the version. I tried to fix the subsequent issues with mock-recipe-server but I think someone else should probably look at that.
